The Botanist Vegan Restaurant

Inspired by Dalmatia's rich culinary heritage of herbs, spices, and fresh local produce

Explore Our Menu Book a Table
4.9/5 from over 4,000 reviews

Our Story

Founded by four brothers from Petrčane, The Botanist is more than just a restaurant—it's a celebration of Dalmatian culture, family values, and sustainable gastronomy.

After one brother adopted veganism, the family embraced its ethical, health, and environmental benefits, leading them to create a restaurant that appeals to all diners—not just vegans.

Our grandparents' dedication to slow-cooked, flavor-focused Mediterranean cuisine deeply influences our cooking philosophy. We strive to honor these roots while innovating through sustainable practices.

Explore Our Menu Learn More

Our Values

Sustainable Practices

We prioritize zero-waste practices and source organic ingredients from local farms, including our own, to minimize our environmental footprint.

Culinary Excellence

We elevate vegan cuisine to gourmet standards by blending traditional Dalmatian flavors with innovative cooking techniques and high-quality ingredients.

Community Connection

We collaborate with local organizations and farmers to strengthen our community ties and promote sustainable food systems throughout Zadar and beyond.

Inspired by Dalmatian culinary traditions, our plant-based menu celebrates local ingredients and sustainable practices.
